channel.title: Read plzz IP/port CHANGE from my client/server how?
channel.description:
Hello how can i change port and ip from my servers hamachi Ip, Plzz help my/mee, and how can i set my server online for other people,
Greetss, (good tutorial plz)

item.description:

oke and can you say my how i no hamachi can make?
and how can I still use my hamachi ip then what should I change?
and I still change the port if so where? and which files should I open it and change my ip? because I have a private client,

Greetss!!!,

item.title: Read plzz IP/port CHANGE from my client/server how?
item.dc:creator: @Shorty626 Shorty626
item.description:
@Shorty626 wrote:

I would suggest you avoid using Hamachi. No one really uses that anymore. All you need to do is edit your client to connect to the Hamachi IP. People would have to know to have Hamachi before they would be able to connect.

Read full topic
